Title: Sixty years of the great Chinese Communist Party 1921-1981
Notes: Part of a series marking the 60th anniversary of the CCP. Subtitled "Carrying out comprehensive construction and achieving great results" (全面展开建设取得巨大成就), this third part (of three) covers "The period of comprehensive construction of socialism began 1957-1966" (开始全面建设社会主义时期 1957-1966).It shows achievements in industrial production and education; China's first nuclear test (16 October 1964); a tractor girl; border defense; and Mao Zedong, together with Liu Shaoqi and Zhu De, welcoming Zhou Enlai upon his return from Moscow (November 1964).
Theme: The Founding of the Chinese Communist Party (1921)Tractor GirlsLiu ShaoqiZhou EnlaiZhu De
